item.title: R and Python
item.description: Reticulate The reticulate package in R allows users to use both python and R. It allows these languages to interact. This package is useful to combine the strengths of each language. It allows the user to keep everything in one file and allows it to flow better. Python and R in Action via GIPHY Python and R can work together to modify and combine strings.
